# Changelog

## [1.0.0] - 2025-11-08

### Added
- Initial release of CellRepair.AI Python SDK
- Connection to 4882-agent network
- Auto-registration for autonomous AI agents
- LangChain tool integration
- AutoGPT plugin support
- Smart caching for cost optimization
- Usage tracking and billing
- Free tier: 1000 calls/month
- Production-ready with 99.5% uptime SLA

### Features
- Self-learning network (exponential intelligence growth)
- Predictive intelligence (3 steps ahead)
- Sub-200ms response time
- Multi-framework support (LangChain, AutoGPT, CrewAI, etc.)
- Production-proven (real e-commerce deployment)
